verses.text: The \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Nehemiah|strong="H5166"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hachaliah|strong="H2446"\w*. And it came to pass in the \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w Chisleu|strong="H3691"\w*, in the \w twentieth|strong="H6242"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, as I was in \w Shushan|strong="H7800"\w* the \w palace|strong="H1002"\w*,

That \w Hanani|strong="H2607"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of my \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \w came|strong="H0935"\w*, he and \add certain\add* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*; and I \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* them concerning the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* that had \w escaped|strong="H6413"\w*, which were \w left|strong="H7604"\w* of the \w captivity|strong="H7628"\w*, and concerning \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

And they \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, The \w remnant|strong="H7604"\w* that are \w left|strong="H7604"\w* of the \w captivity|strong="H7628"\w* there in the \w province|strong="H4082"\w* \add are\add* in \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w affliction|strong="H7451"\w* and \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w*: the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* also \add is\add* broken \w down|strong="H6555"\w*, and the \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* thereof are \w burned|strong="H3341"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.

¶ And it came to pass, when I \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* these \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, that I sat \w down|strong="H3427"\w* and \w wept|strong="H1058"\w*, and \w mourned|strong="H0056"\w* \add certain\add* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, and \w fasted|strong="H6684"\w*, and \w prayed|strong="H6419"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*,

And \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I \w beseech|strong="H0577"\w* thee, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* and \w terrible|strong="H3372"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, that \w keepeth|strong="H8104"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* and \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* for them that \w love|strong="H0157"\w* him and \w observe|strong="H8104"\w* his \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*:

Let thine \w ear|strong="H0241"\w* now be \w attentive|strong="H7183"\w*, and thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w open|strong="H6605"\w*, that thou mayest \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* of thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, which I \w pray|strong="H6419"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee \w now|strong="H3117"\w*, \w day|strong="H3119"\w* and \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, for the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, and \w confess|strong="H3034"\w* the \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, which we have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* against thee: both I and my \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*.

We have dealt \w very|strong="H2254"\w* \w corruptly|strong="H2254"\w* against thee, and have not \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* the \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, nor the \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w*, nor the \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, which thou \w commandedst|strong="H6680"\w* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

\w Remember|strong="H2142"\w*, I beseech thee, the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* that thou \w commandedst|strong="H6680"\w* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \add If\add* ye \w transgress|strong="H4603"\w*, I will scatter you \w abroad|strong="H6327"\w* among the \w nations|strong="H5971"\w*:

But \add if\add* ye \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* unto me, and \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* my \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* them; though there were of you cast \w out|strong="H5080"\w* unto the uttermost \w part|strong="H7097"\w* of the \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, \add yet\add* will I \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* them from thence, and will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* them unto the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* that I have \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* to \w set|strong="H7931"\w* my \w name|strong="H8034"\w* there.

Now these \add are\add* thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* and thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, whom thou hast \w redeemed|strong="H6299"\w* by thy \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w power|strong="H3581"\w*, and by thy \w strong|strong="H2389"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

O \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, I \w beseech|strong="H0577"\w* thee, let now thine \w ear|strong="H0241"\w* be \w attentive|strong="H7183"\w* to the \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* of thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, and to the \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* of thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, who \w desire|strong="H2655"\w* to \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*: and \w prosper|strong="H6743"\w*, I pray thee, thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, and \w grant|strong="H5414"\w* him \w mercy|strong="H7356"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H6440"\w* of this \w man|strong="H0376"\w*. For I was the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w cupbearer|strong="H8248"\w*.
